author: taulepton_
content: Great report <@944007601400741989> . If you have time I would be interested to find out how https://github.com/scroll-tech/reth-witness-indexer performs in similar benchmarks. Its an extended version of reth with a witness indexer similar to etherex.

author: taulepton_
content: It may not be quite as efficient as etherex as this is done as a sort of post-execution hook but still interested to get some statistics.
